name: Castaway Party
description:
Compete in LIVE minigames! Can you beat all the other Castaways?

MASTER OVER A DOZEN MINIGAMES
Outrun boulders, race through falling rocks, and climb vines faster than your opponents to WIN! Knock the other Castaways off sinking tiles or bump them into sharks to take first place.

COMPETE IN A LIVE MINIGAME CIRCUIT
Get matched with 3 other Castaways and play a 4-minigame circuit to rack up the most points.

THREE EXCITING LIVE MODES
Ranked - Earn trophies and climb the leaderboard!
Casual - Practice a minigame circuit against other Castaways without losing trophies.
Daily Challenge - Compete in a new, rotating minigame circuit every day.

SHOW OFF YOUR WINNING MOVES
Are you a fist-pumping pirate? A head-banging viking? What about a chicken-dancing dino skeleton? Whatever your style, show it off when you win a circuit!

PARTY PASS SEASON 2
The new season is here! Ninja is joining the Castaways, along with his signature dance moves and stickers. Purchase the Season 2 Party Pass in-game to earn XP and reach 25 levels of loot, coins, and exclusive items.

FEATURES:
FREE TO PLAY - Castaway Party is free to play, with in-game options to purchase the Party Pass, new skins, dances, and stickers.
REAL-TIME - Play directly against others in a real-time multiplayer game.
GLOBAL LEADERBOARD - Earn trophies in Competitive play and see how you rank.
PARTY UP - Send friends a Party Code and invite them to compete against you.
COLLECT IT ALL - Unlock and play with your favorite Castaways, collect dances for epic wins, and equip fun stickers to taunt other players.
LOOT BOXES - Open them in the Party Pass or with Win Tokens to get tons of new Items, coins, and XP.
WIN TOKENS - Earn up to 3 per day (one per game mode) by finishing in the top spot. 5 tokens automatically unlock a new Loot Box.
DAILY LOGIN BONUS - Visit the app every day to earn rewards.
ITEM SHOP - Updated daily with new skins, dances, and stickers for purchase.
QUICK GAMES - Play a 4 game circuit in just 3 minutes for an action-packed way to take a break or stay entertained while on the move.
